title: aNaivAi aDiyEnai
sahitya:
aNaivAi aDiyEnai anuvAvi malaiyOnE


anupallavi

  tuNai kOri varum en tuyar tIrum AruDanE enaip-pEranbuDanE inrum ini enrumE


caraNam    iNai vErillAdu irakkamurum ayyanE ihapara vAzhvinai sukhamuara sheivOnE
paNivOraip-parivODu pAlittu varuvOnE aNaiyum karangaL AriranDu uDaiyOnE
